title: GPT new note explanation
content:
Here’s the updated index.html to include a title field for the user to input note titles:


Updated index.html


<!DOCTYPE html>

<html lang="en">

<head>

  <meta charset="UTF-8">

  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

  <title>Notes App</title>

  <style>

    /* Reset some default styles */

    * {

      box-sizing: border-box;

      margin: 0;

      padding: 0;

    }


    body {

      font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;

      background-color: #f5f7fa;

      color: #333;

      display: flex;

      flex-direction: column;

      align-items: center;

      padding: 20px;

      min-height: 100vh;

    }


    h1 {

      font-size: 2rem;

      margin-bottom: 20px;

      color: #444;

    }


    form {

      width: 100%;

      max-width: 600px;

      margin-bottom: 30px;

      background-color: #fff;

      padding: 20px;

      border-radius: 8px;

      box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

    }


    #noteTitle, #noteContent {

      border: 1px solid #ddd;

      padding: 12px;

      border-radius: 4px;

      outline: none;

      font-size: 1rem;

      margin-bottom: 10px;

      background-color: #fafafa;

    }


    #noteTitle:focus, #noteContent:focus {

      border-color: #4a90e2;

      box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(74, 144, 226, 0.5);

      background-color: #fff;

    }


    #noteTitle:empty::before, #noteContent:empty::before {

      content: attr(placeholder);

      color: #999;

      pointer-events: none;

    }


    button {

      padding: 10px 20px;

      background-color: #4a90e2;

      color: #fff;

      border: none;

      border-radius: 4px;

      font-size: 1rem;

      cursor: pointer;

      transition: background-color 0.3s ease;

    }


    button:hover {

      background-color: #357ab8;

    }


    #notes {

      width: 100%;

      max-width: 1100px;

    }


    #notes h2 {

      font-size: 1.5rem;

      margin-bottom: 15px;

      color: #444;

    }


    #notesContainer {

      display: flex;

      flex-direction: column;

      gap: 15px;

    }


    .note {

      background-color: #fff;

      padding: 15px 20px;

      border-radius: 8px;

      box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

      font-size: 1rem;

      line-height: 1.6;

      color: #333;

      word-wrap: break-word;

    }


    .note:nth-child(odd) {

      background-color: #f0f4f8;

    }


    .note h3 {

      margin-bottom: 8px;

      font-size: 1.25rem;

      color: #333;

    }


    .note p {

      margin: 0;

    }


    /* Responsive Design */

    @media (max-width: 640px) {

      body {

        padding: 10px;

      }


      form, #notes {

        max-width: 100%;

      }

    }

  </style>

</head>

<body>

  <h1>Notes App</h1>

  <form id="noteForm">

    <div id="noteTitle" contenteditable="true" placeholder="Write note title here..."></div>

    <div id="noteContent" contenteditable="true" placeholder="Write your note here..."></div>

    <button type="submit">Add Note</button>

  </form>

  <div id="notes">

    <h2>All Notes</h2>

    <div id="notesContainer"></div>

  </div>

  <script src="app.js" type="module"></script>

</body>

</html>


Changes Made

1. Added id="noteTitle" for the title input field in the form.

2. Ensured the placeholder for noteTitle displays “Write note title here…” for clear instructions.

3. Retained the noteContent field as is for the note’s body input.


The title field is now editable and styled similarly to the note content field. When the user submits a note, both title and content will be saved and displayed in the list below.
